Sentencas: Fault detection and identification are new and challenging tasks for electrical generation plants that are based on solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis in fuel cell systems using quantitative models and support vector machines

Sentencas: The use of a quantitative model of the plant together with a support vector machine to design and operate a supervised classification system is proposed.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis in fuel cell systems using quantitative models and support vector machines

Sentencas: This type of system, which uses a few easy-to-measure features selected through the maximisation of a classification error bound, proved to be effective in revealing a faulty condition and identifying it among the four considered fault classes.
Titulo: Fault diagnosis in fuel cell systems using quantitative models and support vector machines
